# MLHandActionClassifier

**Structure**

A task that creates a hand action classification model by training with videos of people’s hand movements that you provide.

## Declaration

```swift
struct MLHandActionClassifier
```

## Training a hand action classifier asynchronously

- **train(trainingData:parameters:sessionParameters:)**: Begins an asynchronous hand action classifier’s training session.
- **makeTrainingSession(trainingData:parameters:sessionParameters:)**: Creates an asynchronous hand action classifier’s training session.
- **resume(_:)**: Begins or continues an asynchronous hand action classifier’s training session.
- **restoreTrainingSession(sessionParameters:)**: Recreates an asynchronous hand action classifier’s training session by restoring its saved state from the file system.

## Creating a hand action classifier from a checkpoint

- **init(checkpoint:)**: Creates a hand action classifier from a training session checkpoint.

## Training a hand action classifier synchronously

- **init(trainingData:parameters:)**: Creates a hand action classifier by starting a synchronous training session.

## Evaluating a hand action classifier

- **evaluation(on:)**: Generates metrics describing the hand action classifier’s performance on labeled videos.
- **trainingMetrics**: Measurements of the hand action classifier’s performance on the training dataset.
- **validationMetrics**: Measurements of the hand action classifier’s performance on the validation dataset.

## Testing a hand action classifier

- **prediction(from:)**: Generates a hand action prediction for a video.
- **predictions(from:)**: Generates an array of hand action predictions for each video in a URL array.
- **MLHandActionClassifier.Prediction**: A collection of predictions, each paired with its confidence, for a range of video frames.

## Saving a hand action classifier

- **write(to:metadata:)**: Exports the hand action classifier as a CoreML model file.
- **write(toFile:metadata:)**: Exports the hand action classifier as a Core ML model file.

## Inspecting a hand action classifier model

- **model**: The underlying Core ML model of the hand action classifier stored in memory.
- **modelParameters**: The hand action model’s configuration parameters.

## Describing a hand action classifier

- **description**: A text representation of the hand action classifier.
- **debugDescription**: A text representation of the hand action classifier suitable for debugging.
- **playgroundDescription**: A description of the hand action classifier that’s viewable in a playground.

## Supporting types

- **MLHandActionClassifier.DataSource**: A hand action classifier dataset that contains annotated videos or hand joint location data.
- **MLHandActionClassifier.ModelParameters**: A set of parameters that affect the training process of a hand action classifier task.
- **MLHandActionClassifier.VideoAugmentationOptions**: Options a hand action classification training session can use to generate additional training data from the videos you provide.

## Default Implementations

- **CustomDebugStringConvertible Implementations**
- **CustomPlaygroundDisplayConvertible Implementations**
- **CustomStringConvertible Implementations**

## Video models

- **Creating an Action Classifier Model**: Train a machine learning model to recognize a person’s body movements.
- **Detecting human actions in a live video feed**: Identify body movements by sending a person’s pose data from a series of video frames to an action-classification model.
- **MLActionClassifier**: A model you train with videos to classify a person’s body movements.
- **MLStyleTransfer**: A model you train to apply an image’s style to other images or videos.

## Conforms To

- Copyable
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomPlaygroundDisplayConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
